revision.comment: combine adjacent calls to {{inflection of|la|xērophilus}} (3); combine {{inflection of|la|xērophilus}} tag sets dat|m|s and dat|n|s into dat|m//n|s; combine {{inflection of|la|xērophilus}} tag sets abl|m|s and abl|n|s into abl|m//n|s; combine {{inflection of|la|xērophilus}} tag sets dat|m//n|s and abl|m//n|s into dat//abl|m//n|s
